name: Dhruv Patel
bio: As a skilled web developer, Dhruv Patel excels in creating dynamic and user-friendly web applications. With a strong educational background in web development from St. Cloir College, Dhruv is passionate about staying up-to-date with the latest web technologies and best practices.

name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Sarah Johnson is an experienced digital marketing manager who has successfully executed marketing campaigns for international brands. With a strategic mindset and creative flair, Sarah leads XY Corp's digital marketing efforts.

name: David Lee
bio: David Lee is a dedicated product manager with a proven track record of bringing innovative products to market. His expertise in product development and market research contributes significantly to XY Corp's success.

name: Linda Chen
bio: Linda Chen is the Human Resources Manager at XY Corp, responsible for fostering a positive workplace environment and managing HR operations. Her dedication to employee well-being is a cornerstone of XY Corp's culture.

name: Alex Turner
bio: Alex Turner, as the Sales Director, leads XY Corp's sales team to drive revenue growth and customer satisfaction. With a customer-centric approach, Alex ensures the company's success in the market.
